data.title: Tree + Generator ZERO/POINT From A Main
data.description: Use this simple, but effective ZERO/POINT line up to successfully disrupt Defenders playing Tree and Generator.

data.title: Tiles to Market ZERO/POINT Line Up
data.description: Use this Market ZERO/POINT line up to scale, and take Mid control. Defenders playing within Market will not be able to use utility to contest back, or support teammates on the B Site.

data.title: A Site Dice ZERO/POINT Execute From A Main
data.description: Enable your team with this powerful site ZERO/POINT line up, as it'll disable any Defenders playing the A Site.

data.title: A Wine to A Site FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for A Site from A Wine to delay a defuse.
